Text.Page:
The argons hit one of our supply convoys and destroyed an entire shipment of rations. Our fighters won't last if they can't keep their strength up.

Get a supply of emergency rations from {@LinkCreature:78#3008#Artur} and resupply our troops in the field!

I don't have to tell a veteran like you how vital it is to maintain the supply lines to the battlefield.

Here, take these emergency rations and get them to our troops.

There's no time to waste. Get those rations to the soldiers who need them.

I'll be damned if a soldier dies because they went hungry!

Oh, thank the gods!

I worried I might have to learn what argon tasted like.

Never thought I'd be so happy to see a package of hardtack.

Thanks, .

Thanks for not forgetting about us.

There's no feeling worse than being forgotten.
Well, it's not a spiced roast, but I'm damned glad to get it. Thanks!
The Shariar never forgets their own. Thanks for this!

We'll be all right for now, thanks to you.

This should hold us until the next supply shipment.
I'm glad you took care of our fighters, <PCNAME>. Such a small thing, but it means so much to people risking their lives day in and day out.
